column4: problem installing gaim-vv , i did ./configure,  error i got was...   Could not run GLIB test program, checking why...  The test program failed to compile or link. See the file config.log for the exact error that occurred. This usually means GLIB is incorrectly installed. configure: error: GLib 2.0 is required to build Gaim; please make sure you have the GLib development headers installed.
could anybody help ....
install glib/gtk devel packages
mplayer f.e.
vlc can do it too, and it has a GUI
i have mplayer , even tho not playing
what exactly is the problem? what does mplayer spit out?
i open the disc in mplayer by  clicking VCD > Open Disc...  , it is saying  Failed to open vcd://5
try "mplayer vcd://" on commandline
i got Audio: no sound
strange, maybe your vcd is not ok? give vlc a try

in this I'd say the vcd or your drive is to be blamed... you might want to check permissions to your cd/dvd device thoough
check whether it works as root (sudo=

no clue what's wrong then
why it is not copying to my disk , when i tried to copy it , it is saying Error "I/O error" while copying "/media/cdr...SEQ01.DAT".
vcd broken... they use a less safe scheme for error correction than data cd-roms
is there any way to copy it ...
dd with conv=noerror,sync
